Class Ballot

java.lang.Object
Ballot
public class Ballot
extends Object
The purpose of this class is to represent a ballot that holds a list of candidates running for a specified office

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Ballot​(String officeName)
    This constructor creates a ballot for a designated office

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCandidate​(Candidate c)
    This method adds a Candidate to the ballot and ensures no duplicates are added
    ArrayList<Candidate> getCandidates()
    This method returns the ballot that holds the candidates and their information
    String getOfficeName()
    This method returns the name of the office up for a vote
    String toString()
    This method generates and returns a string representation of the ballot, including all the candidates It overrides the toString() method

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
